attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Who pays working class expenses when they have to work away from home...nobody..no tax relief to help keep accomadation when working away. The members of parliment have been robbing us for to long so lets make them pay there own way

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
